title: Patch 5.11 Twisted Treeline - first 7min reduced damage to towers
body:
The new TT is great, but towers can be taken very quickly and easy and thus snowballing the game.
Teams following this strategy also punish the enemy jungler very hard - making jungling impossible when the first turrets fall at the 3 minute mark.

Like on SR, I would like that towers take reduced damage in the first minutes of the game.

replies.body:
Are you crazy? The additional turret( + the trinkets) are slowing the game down so much and
you want them take less dmg?

I had games vs siege comps (nida & azir duo lane w/o jungler). There is no way anyone can defend the turret alone, so your jungler has to sit under the turret as well from the beginning of the game. Because it takes 3 minutes for them to break the turret (same time for 1 full clear of the jungle).. Insanely fast
